subject: math
title: Counting Adventures
description: Learn to count from 1 to 10 with fun animal friends!

questions.question: How many cats do you see?
questions.explanation: Count the cats carefully - there are 3 adorable cats!

questions.question: What comes after the number 5?
questions.explanation: When counting up, 6 comes right after 5!

questions.question: How many fingers are on one hand?
questions.explanation: Each hand has 5 fingers - count them!

subject: math
title: Fun Subtraction
description: Learn to subtract by taking away objects in fun scenarios!

questions.question: If you have 5 apples and eat 2, how many are left?

subject: reading
title: Letter Sounds
description: Learn the sounds that letters make with fun phonics games!

questions.question: What sound does the letter 'A' make?
questions.explanation: The letter A makes the 'Ah' sound, like in 'apple'!

questions.question: Which letter makes the 'Muh' sound?
questions.explanation: The letter M makes the 'Muh' sound, like in 'mouse'!

questions.question: What sound does 'S' make?
questions.explanation: The letter S makes the 'Sss' sound, like a snake!

subject: reading
title: Sight Words Fun
description: Practice reading common sight words that appear in stories!

questions.question: Which word says 'THE'?
questions.explanation: THE is spelled T-H-E. It's one of the most common words!

questions.question: Can you find the word 'AND'?
questions.explanation: AND is spelled A-N-D. Great reading!

subject: reading
title: Story Time
description: Read a simple story and answer questions about what happened!

questions.question: In the story about the red ball, where did Tom find it?
questions.explanation: Tom found the red ball in the yard. Good memory!

questions.question: What color was the cat in our story?
questions.explanation: The cat was orange. You're paying attention!

questions.question: How many dogs were playing in the park?
questions.explanation: There were two dogs playing in the park!
